title: Stressless
content:
![Stressless Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420023144im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/9167.jpg)   
   
This is a typeface that I have developed as a basis for a random process of events to be applied towards. The original basis for the typeface was to create something that had both stamina to withstand the process as well as refined details that would be eliminated by the process. I wanted to create a very straight lined classical font to apply a very conceptual idea towards.
author: vickster181
